reqs:
Registration in this course is by application only. Information regarding the application process has been sent to eligible BCom students.
Students may receive credit for only one of COMM 466 and COMM 497. COMM 466 may be used to satisfy the COMM 49x requirement.

Students may receive credit for only one of COMM 466 and COMM 497. COMM 466 may be used to satisfy the COMM 49x requirement.
description: Teams comprising students in COMM 466 and APSC 486 propose a new product, produce a viable prototype, and develop a business plan for the marketplace. Credit may only be obtained for one of COMM 466 and APSC 486.
